trigger: Stream going live for a channel you follow
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time a stream is going live for the specified Channel that you follow.
This trigger fires every time you start streaming on Twitch.
This trigger fires every time there is a new follower of your channel.
This trigger fires every time you follow a new channel on Twitch.

trigger: New video posted by a channel you follow
trigger_description: This trigger fires every time there is a new video posted by a channel you follow.
This trigger fires every time the specified user starts following a channel on Twitch.
This trigger fires every time there is a new video posted by you.
